thread.title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20
thread.title_full: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20

title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20
text:
> Top News Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20 FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 16, 2014 file photo Oscar Pistorius sits in the high court for the fourth day of sentencing in Pretoria, South Africa. Pistorius is expected to be released Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 under house arrest. (AP Photo/Alon Skuy, Pool, File)) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
